backend/main.mo: Minimal Motoko actor with no functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping new scenario and preset-text updates to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of many frontend files including components, hooks, and utilities used across the app.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variable definitions for light and dark modes with color tokens and layout defaults.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, theme provider, and global toaster notifications.
frontend/src/components/AdminDemoModeTog: Toggle button enabling or disabling attacker demo mode using simulation state.
frontend/src/components/AIRiskDetectorPa: Displays simulated AI risk metrics using heuristics, meters, and pattern analysis values from state.
frontend/src/components/AnimatedInfograp: Canvas‑based animated overlay combined with a static infographic image for visual data‑flow effects.
frontend/src/components/AttackerDashboar: Shows simulated attacker view including captured keystrokes, reconstructed text, and optional transmission animation.
frontend/src/components/AttackSimulation: Renders a five‑stage attack timeline with icons and active‑stage indicators based on simulation state.
frontend/src/components/AutoBlockingAler: Displays an alert when auto-blocking is active and allows the user to reset the simulation.
frontend/src/components/AwarenessQuiz.ts: Implements a multi‑question cybersecurity quiz with scoring, explanations, and completion handling.
frontend/src/components/DisclaimerBanner: Shows a banner explaining the simulation’s educational nature and data‑privacy assurances.
frontend/src/components/HelpTooltip.tsx: Wraps content with a tooltip trigger and displays informational text on hover.
frontend/src/components/InContextWarning: Renders a small warning message with an info icon for contextual notices.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Provides the main page layout with header, navigation, background, and disclaimer banner.
frontend/src/components/ModuleInfoPopove: Displays an info button that opens a popover with module details and optional tooltip.
frontend/src/components/OnboardingOverla: Implements a multi‑step onboarding overlay guiding users through tool features.
frontend/src/components/ReportGeneratorB: Button that generates a downloadable local report using the current simulation state.
frontend/src/components/RotatingDashboar: A card component that tilts on mouse movement for an interactive 3D effect.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioQuiz.tsx: Interactive quiz component handling question navigation, answer selection, explanations, scoring, and retry flow.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioQuizModa: Modal wrapper for displaying scenario quizzes with focus management, escape handling, and fallback when quiz data is missing.
frontend/src/components/ScenarioVideoMod: Empty placeholder file for a scenario video modal component.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedAntivir: Visual simulated antivirus scanner showing scan states, threat detection, and quarantine/remove actions driven by simulation state.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedCounter: Displays live counters for keystrokes, scan count, and block count from the simulation state.
frontend/src/components/SimulatedKeylogg: Simulated keylogger input box capturing typed text, showing warnings, and blocking input when flagged by simulation state.
frontend/src/components/SimulationSettin: Settings panel allowing users to adjust simulation behavior such as auto-blocking, animations, and scan duration.
frontend/src/components/TestScenariosPan: UI for running predefined scenarios, viewing learning content, and launching scenario quizzes with modal support.
frontend/src/components/ThreatMeter3D.ts: Canvas-based circular threat meter rendering percentage and risk level with gradient arcs.
frontend/src/components/ThreeSceneAccent: Three.js scene rendering a rotating torus ring with ambient lighting and orbit controls.
frontend/src/components/TransmissionAnim: UI element showing a pulsing send icon and progress bar for simulated transmission.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth client, login flow, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOnboarding.ts: Tracks onboarding visibility using localStorage and provides open/dismiss/reset actions.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning no queries for a fully client-side simulation.
frontend/src/hooks/useSimulationState.ts: Zustand store managing simulation input, risk scoring, AV actions, blocking logic, and settings.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup with custom theme variables, component styles, utilities, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/customScenarioVideos.ts: Empty module placeholder for custom scenario video handling.
frontend/src/lib/reportGenerator.ts: Generates a text report summarizing simulation data and triggers file download as a text blob.
frontend/src/lib/scenarioLearningContent: Defines scenario content structures and provides educational text for multiple risk-level typing scenarios. Used to display defensive, awareness-focused information for each test scenario.
frontend/src/lib/scenarioQuizzes.ts: Defines quiz structures and supplies multiple-choice quiz data for each scenario. Provides educational, defensive explanations tied to scenario content.
frontend/src/lib/scenarioVideos.ts: Placeholder module for scenario-related videos with no implemented content.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers. Renders the main App component into the root DOM node.
frontend/src/pages/AwarenessPage.tsx: Renders an informational page explaining keyloggers, their types, and prevention tips. Includes infographics and an awareness quiz.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Implements the interactive keylogger simulation dashboard with panels, onboarding, risk tools, and admin/demo features. Coordinates layout and user controls for the simulation environment.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, animations, typography, and plugin integrations. Defines theme extensions and content scanning paths.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, existing features, new feature requests, and development state. Describes current goals related to adding a new practical scenario workflow.
